title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Odell/Freddie Kitchens tension rising; Baker hype out of control; XXL Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Odell/Freddie Kitchens tension rising; Baker hype out of control; XXL Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 

In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the increasing tension between Odell Beckham and Freddie Kitchens, why Odell is blowing it by missing OTA's, why the pre-season hype surrounding Baker Mayfield is out of control and is creating unrealistic expectations, and answers listener questions in a massive Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
